1.description: Learn basic Filipino greetings, polite words, and how to use them throughout the day. Your child will also say numbers, colors, and parts of the body in Filipino.

2.description: Learn how to describe Filipino meals, family titles, and household items in Tagalog. We’ll also cover how to address the first, second, and third person.

3.description: Discover traditional dances in the Philippines while describing actions in Tagalog. Your child will also study basic locations, animals, and emotions.

4.description: Explore Filipino art forms while asking basic questions (i.e. Who, What, Where, When, Why) in Tagalog. We’ll also cover objects found at the playground, school, and mall.
